sys_remote_update_set.description:
Postmaster enables intelligent routing of inbound emails to tasks:
-Multiple ordered Email Routing Rules can be configured to determine routing behavior. -Use conditions such as 'Recipient is' or 'Body contains' to route intelligently. -From inbound emails, create records on any task-based table. -Automatically apply a chosen template to any created record. -Configure where the 'subject' and 'body' of the email should be copied. -For Service Catalog order creation, automatically apply a Catalog item and generate the appropriate REQ>RITM hierarchy. -Scripting capability for advanced requirements
Notes: -If no matching Email Routing Rules are found, the instance will continue to process existing Inbound actions. -To maintain the original 'To' address when redirecting email from your servers to ServiceNow, be sure 'relay' email messages.
sys_remote_update_set.name: Postmaster Email Routing v1.4
